titlStmt.titl: Data for: "An Efficient and Accurate Numerical Determination of the Cluster Resolution Metric"

citation.biblCit: Armstrong, Michael; Paulina de la Mata, 2020, "Data for: "An Efficient and Accurate Numerical Determination of the Cluster Resolution Metric"", https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/RLMSRW, UAL Dataverse, V1, UNF:6:qXCtqx/Qbnep7TX4+112+w== [fileUNF]

titlStmt.titl: Data for: "An Efficient and Accurate Numerical Determination of the Cluster Resolution Metric"

stdyInfo.abstract: Dataset containing peak table information for a study discriminating between the odiferous profiles of cotton and polyester fabrics. Collected on a Comprehensive 2-Dimensional Gas Chromatography - Time-of-Flight Mass Spectrometry (GCxGC-TOFMS) instrument. Used in the paper: "An Efficient and Accurate Numerical Determination of the Cluster Resolution Metric", for testing new data analysis strategies.

citation.biblCit: de la Mata, A. Paulina, et al. "Comprehensive two-dimensional gas chromatographic profiling and chemometric interpretation of the volatile profiles of sweat in knit fabrics." Analytical and bioanalytical chemistry 409.7 (2017): 1905-1913.
